snippet: Martin Demichelis spared Manchester City from a second successive loss by heading in a late equalizer in a 2-2 draw at Arsenal in England’s Premier League on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Martin Demichelis spared Manchester City from a second successive loss by heading in a late equalizer in a 2-2 draw at Arsenal in England’s Premier League on Saturday.

headline.main: Manchester City Ties Arsenal on Late Goal
headline.print_headline: Manchester City Ties Arsenal on Late Goal
